entry.title: Peer selection
entry.summary: In a Lightning-dev post, user ZmnSCPxj responds to a question about discovering nodes on the network. They state that there are no UIs available but current Lightning Network programs keep track of this information in their databases. The details of each program's tracking varies, and the individual developers likely know how to extract this information. ZmnSCPxj also shares a website they found, explorer.acinq.co, which they used to connect to a couple of nodes.
